title: Vintage price tag sticker PNG assets (transparent)

requirements.summary: Generate three vintage-style price-tag sticker PNGs (transparent background) with specified labels and colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Three PNG files are produced, one per sticker label (MINT / NEAR MINT / PLAYED).
Each PNG has a transparent background with only the sticker artwork present (no rectangular background fill).
Each sticker has visible subtle paper texture and a small peeled-corner detail.
Sticker text matches exactly and uses the specified text color (green/blue/orange), while maintaining a cohesive vintage price-tag style across all three.

file_operations.description: Add generated transparent PNG asset for vintage price tag sticker with subtle paper texture and a small peeled corner; text reads exactly "MINT" in green; no shadows/background outside sticker shape.

Add generated transparent PNG asset for vintage price tag sticker with subtle paper texture and a small peeled corner; text reads exactly "NEAR MINT" in blue; no shadows/background outside sticker shape.

Add generated transparent PNG asset for vintage price tag sticker with subtle paper texture and a small peeled corner; text reads exactly "PLAYED" in orange; no shadows/background outside sticker shape.

requirements.summary: Place the generated sticker PNGs under frontend/public/assets/generated so they are directly accessible via /assets/generated/<filename>.
acceptanceCriteria: The three generated PNGs exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Requesting each asset at /assets/generated/<filename> returns the image successfully in the deployed app.

file_operations.description: Document the expected direct browser paths for the generated assets to validate static serving: /assets/generated/price-tag-mint.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/price-tag-near-mint.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/price-tag-played.dim_512x512.png.
